long_description: Sen Cha Green Tea + C gives you a double-shot of green tea that imparts earthy notes. Shade-grown matcha adds a sweet layer of grassy undertones. A natural alternative to effervescent drink mixes, this whole-leaf blend of sencha and matcha powder provides more nutrients than a typical tea bag. Acerola cherries provide 300% DV of antioxidant Vitamin C; coconut water powder delivers replenishing electrolytes. Traditional immune-support blend of ginger, turmeric and orange peel helps promote general wellness. Sen Cha Green Tea + C is vegan, kosher and free of GMOs, gluten and sugar. Discount will be applied when you check out.
short_description: Sen Cha Green Tea + C gives you a double-shot of green tea that imparts earthy notes. Shade-grown matcha adds a sweet layer of grassy undertones.
